data.name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom - Rehydrated Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The fully remastered, nay, rehydrated original soundtrack of SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle For Bikini Bottom – Rehydrated. Includes all fifteen beloved tracks that make every day the Best Day Ever!
data.about_the_game: The fully remastered, nay, rehydrated original soundtrack of SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle For Bikini Bottom – Rehydrated. Includes all fifteen beloved tracks that make every day the Best Day Ever!
data.short_description: Enjoy all your favorite tracks from the game in Rehydrated splendor!
